effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 585,075 damage to your primary target and 93,777 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 379 Versatility for 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 564,371 damage to your primary target and 92,861 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.
(2) Set: Ice Lance damage increased by 8%.
(4) Set: Damage dealt by Fingers of Frost enhanced Ice Lances invoke a Frigid Pulse, dealing 25,818 Frost damage to nearby targets. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 503,845 damage to your primary target and 99,426 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your healing and damage periodic spells grant 169 Intellect each time they heal or deal damage. Lasts 15 sec, stacking up to 20 times.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 144,103 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
